sentences.english: Any safety deficiencies or violations must be corrected immediately before proceeding with operations.
sentences.chinese: 操作前，必须纠正所有的安全隐患和违章。

sentences.english: Behavior before the adjustment of the level of fines for each violation of the twentieth million and 30 yuan.

sentences.english: Say goodbye to lawless driving, ensure the smooth flow of traffic.

sentences.english: The above breaching behaviors shall be stopped immediately once found.

sentences.english: The club reserves the right to disqualify anybody's membership by the rules;
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部有权根据活动规则中止违章者的会员资格。

sentences.english: Abide operation regulation, forbid peccant operation.
sentences.chinese: 遵守操作规程，严禁违章操作。

sentences.english: There is no one of us but wishes to remove all the illegal dangerous structures in Hong Kong.

sentences.english: After is warned, still violated regulations opera tor's to have tos top its employment contract.

sentences.english: I don't think that speeder will be able to beat this rap .
sentences.chinese: 我认为那个违章超速驾驶者免不了要受罚。

definition: to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
to exceed the speed limit/to speed/high-speed
traffic camera/speed camera/closed-circuit TV police surveillance
to deduct marks (when grading school work)/to have marks deducted/penalty points/to lose points for a penalty or error
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
